title: Men and Masculinity
brief_description: A Two Part documentary that examines the changing roles of men in our society. Part 1, “Men and Masculinity”, looks at social conditioning and the image of a stereotypical male. Part 2, titled “Men and Intimacy”, looks at men and their personal relationships.
